original_text: Later, I will come to Jerusalem. I will take you away to a country that is like your own land here. There will be plenty of grain and new wine for you in that country. There will be bread and there will be vineyards.
korean_text: 내가 와서 너희를 너희 본토와 같이 곡식과 포도주와 떡과 포도원이 있는 땅에 옮기기까지 하리라

sentences.original_text: Later, I will come to Jerusalem
I will take you away to a country
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 한 나라로 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: that is like your own land here
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 너희가 사는 이 땅과 비슷할 것이다

sentences.original_text: There will be plenty of grain
and new wine for you in that country
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 새 포도주가 너희에게 있을 것이다
